metadataAttributes.Title: Integrative Nursing Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Patient-Centered, Relationship-Based Nursing Care. By the end of this specialization, you will be able to practice a patient-centered, relationship-based approach to nursing that utilizes a variety of integrative healing modalities.
metadataAttributes.Skills: integrative healthcare, wellbeing, patient-centered care, improved symptom management, evidence-based practice, symptom management, healthcare, Stress Management, Pain Management, whole-person care, Mindfulness, integrative medicine,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Mary Jo Kreitzer ,Deborah Ringdahl ,Megan Voss ,Janet Tomaino, DNP ,Kim Christensen ,Susan Thompson, DNP ,Louise Delagran ,Alex Haley ,
